endpoints.description: Register a new asset in the organization, providing details such as unique identification, category, and location.
Retrieve detailed information about a specific asset by its unique ID.
Update information of an existing asset, including attributes like usage status or assigned department.
Remove the record of a specified asset that has been decommissioned or disposed of.
Retrieve a comprehensive report of asset audits, highlighting any discrepancies and current conditions.
Assign an asset to a specific user or department, recording the allocation details.
Fetch a list of all available asset categories and their descriptions maintained in the service.
Schedule and record a maintenance activity for a specific asset.
Retrieve the maintenance history of all or specific assets, detailing the performed activities.
Obtain a summary overview of the organizational assets, categorized by status and location.
